entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 01:27 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 01:27 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening. Forecast issued 01:27 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
